message: Let's be fair and split the money. I think this is a good deal for both of us to avoid losing value with inflation.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the inflation rate will affect you more than me. Let's avoid losing too much money.
Bob, my friend, we're losing valuable time here. I'll give you a larger share than my last offer. Let's settle this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
